law.catch_line: In addition to the assistance provided under § 18-2804 of this subtitle, the Office may, subject to...

text.section:
In addition to the assistance provided under § 18-2804 of this subtitle, the Office may, subject to the availability of money in the Fund, assist in the repayment of an education loan owed by a physician who:
Practices a medical specialty that has been identified by the Department as being in shortage in the geographic area of the State where the physician practices that specialty; and
Commits to practicing in the area for a period of time determined by the Office.

The Office shall prioritize funding for the repayment of education loans through the Program in the following order:
Physicians that meet the requirements under § 18-2804(b) of this subtitle;
Physicians practicing primary care in a geographic area where the Department has identified a shortage of primary care physicians; and
Physicians practicing a medical specialty other than primary care in a geographic area where the Department has identified a shortage of that specialty.
